mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qg_goods_temp_stock_temp ( goodsId, userId, STATUS, createdTime, updatedTime ) VALUES ( #{goodsId}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime} );
INSERT INTO qg_goods_temp_stock ( id, goodsId, userId, STATUS, createdTime, updatedTime ) SELECT id,goodsId,userId,1 AS STATUS, createdTime, updatedTime From qg_goods_temp_stock_temp WHERE id =#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE qg_goods SET stock=stock-#{num} WHERE id =#{gid}
